title: Facebook Ordered to Curb Data Collection by Germany Court
text: Facebook (FB) comes under fire as the top civil court in Germany restricts data collection amid ongoing investigation.

title: Facebook exec admits there is a 'trust deficit' as advertiser boycott accelerates
text: A Facebook executive acknowledged Tuesday that the social media giant faces a "trust deficit" amid a widening advertiser revolt over misinformation and hate speech on the platform.

title: Ben and Jerry's joins Facebook and Instagram ad boycott
text: Yahoo Finance's Melody Hahm reports on the increasing number of companies who are boycotting advertising on Facebook and Instagram.

title: Facebook and Tesla Lead Nasdaq Stocks Lower
text: Two of the biggest stocks listed on the exchange pulled key indexes lower from record levels.

title: Instagram expands its TikTok clone ‘Reels’ to new markets
text: Instagram is expanding its TikTok competitor known as “Reels” to new markets, following its launch last year in Brazil. Starting today, Instagram is rolling out further access to Reels in France and Germany, allowing users to record short, 15-second video clips set to music or other audio, then share them on the platform where they […]

title: Factbox: More U.S. companies join Facebook ad boycott bandwagon
text: A handful of U.S. companies have pulled advertising from Facebook Inc in support of a campaign that called out the social media giant for not doing enough to stop hate speech on its platforms.

title: A Flurry Of Companies Are Joining The Growing Facebook Boycott
text: Ben & Jerry’s, Eddie Bauer and Magnolia Pictures all pledged to boycott Facebook on Tuesday, joining a growing movement against the tech giant.

title: Charts Suggest Communications Sector Is Headed Higher
text: Companies that facilitate the communication between people are experiencing a surge in demand for their products and services.

title: Facebook Likely To Parrot TikTok, As It Did With Snapchat: Wedbush Analyst
text: TikTok is a top-five most downloaded app globally, and it isn't owned by Facebook, Inc.

title: Trump's Employment Visa Suspension Under Fire From Business And Tech Leaders
text: Several business leaders are voicing their criticism against President Donald Trump’s decision to halt employment-based immigration to the United States.

title: Ben & Jerry's joins Facebook ad boycott over content moderation practices
text: CNBC's "Squawk on the Street" crew discuss the latest headlines surrounding Facebook, including Ben & Jerry's decision to pull ads from Facebook over disagreements regarding the social media company's content moderation practices.

title: Bespoke's Paul Hickey on Big Tech's recent outperformance
text: Paul Hickey, co-founder of Bespoke Investment Group, and Mike Santoli, CNBC's senior markets commentator, join "Squawk Box" to discuss what they're seeing in the markets as the Nasdaq hits new records.

title: Facebook: To Invest Or Not?
text: Facebook enjoys important investment moats. Some of them are common with other tech giants and some are unique.

title: Facebook (FB) to Cease Selling Basic Oculus Go VR Headset
text: Facebook (FB) plans to put more focus on its 6DOF devices, Oculus Quest and Rift headsets. Hence, it will discontinue Oculus Go VR headset this year.

title: Facebook's (FB) WhatsApp Payments Service Suspended in Brazil
text: Facebook's (FB) WhatsApp payments service, launched last week in Brazil, gets suspended as regulators cite anti-competitive and privacy concerns.

title: WhatsApp digital payments are suspended in Brazil
text: Brazil's Central Bank orders Visa and Mastercard to stop payments through the app.

title: Ben & Jerry’s, Eddie Bauer join Facebook ad boycott
text: Ben & Jerry's and Eddie Bauer have joined a Facebook advertising boycott over concerns about how the social-media giant handles hate speech.

title: Ben & Jerry's joins Facebook advertising boycott over racism
text: Ice-cream maker will suspend paid ads on Facebook and Instagram in US over inaction on hate speech

title: Harrington: FANG names aren't necessarily overvalued, but "they've had more than their share of out
text: Jenny Harrington, chief executive officer and portfolio manager at Gilman Hill Asset Management, talks the consistent out performance of FANG stocks and the broader tech sector.

title: India approves Facebook’s $5.7 billion deal with Reliance Jio Platforms
text: India’s antitrust watchdog has given its blessing to Facebook and Reliance Jio Platforms for their $5.7 billion deal. In a statement on Wednesday, the Competition Commission of India said it had approved Facebook’s proposed multi-billion-dollar investment in the top Indian telecom network.

title: Facebook: No Longer Bullish
text: Facebook: No Longer Bullish

title: Ben & Jerry's Joins Advertising Boycott On Facebook's Platforms To Protest Against Alleged Inaction Over Racism
text: Unilever NV (NYSE: UN) subsidiary Ben & Jerry's on Tuesday announced it is joining the "Stop Hate For Profit" campaign.

title: Brazil suspends WhatsApp’s payments service
text: Brazil, the second largest market for WhatsApp, has suspended the instant messaging app’s mobile payments service in the country a week after its rollout in what is the latest setback for Facebook.
